8. 资源

The British Council is the UK’s international organisation for cultural relations and educational opportunities. The British Council website provides a wide range of information for international students planning to study in the UK.

英国国际学生事务委员会(UKCISA)是一家英国的国家级咨询机构，为留学生以及与其共事的人员提供服务。近50年来，他们一直在为留学生、大学、学院和学生会提供支持。 Find out more about how you can prepare yourself for academic study by using the Prepare for Success online learning materials.

The UCAS organisation co-ordinates applications to all UK universities, and also provides useful information for international students and quizzes to help you decide on your career.

The Target Jobs website provides a guide for international students who are looking for a job in the UK, as well as advice on getting work experience.

The Prospects website provides information about over 400 graduate jobs, and includes a useful Planner which will match your skills and personality to job profiles. The website includes advice on writing CVs, making the most of work experience and insight into different job sectors.

Personality questionnaires such as the Myers Brigg Type Indicator provide analysis of personality and career choice.

When I researched my options for the future it was difficult to decide which resources were reliable. Having a list of suggested resources makes my research easier
Undergraduate
